sn37.34:4.1: “Mendicants, a female noble disciple who grows in five ways grows nobly, taking on what is essential and excellent in this life.
sn37.34:4.3: She grows in faith, ethics, learning, generosity, and wisdom.
sn37.34:4.4: A female noble disciple who grows in these five ways grows nobly, taking on what is essential and excellent in this life.”
sn37.34:5.1: “When she grows in faith and ethics,
sn37.34:5.2: wisdom, and both generosity and learning—
sn37.34:5.3: a virtuous laywoman such as she
sn37.34:5.4: takes on what is essential for herself in this life.”
sn37.34:9.1: The Linked Discourses on females are complete.
